page.title: 04Leisure and Recreation.
page.content: {Youth Club:}On 3 nights.For ages 9-18. 10p subs.Activities:swimming (in school pool),football,rounders,hockey, snooker,table-tennis & darts. {Village Institute:}Used for playgroup, Plays,Discos & Bingo. {Church Hall:}Used for Jumble sales, Brownies,Scouts,Cubs & Ventures. {Tennis Club:}For ages 11 upwards. 3 hard courts. Open 7 days weekly. Junior club 7.00 to 8.00 Weds.. Subs adults Â£11 juniors Â£6.50. {Bowls Club:}For ages 13 upwards.Open seven days weekly.Club nights Mon., Weds.,Thurs.. {Athletics Club:}For ages 8 upwards. 20p subs.Juniors 6.45,Adults 7.30. Tues.and Thurs only, on sports field. Activities: High jump,long jump, hurdles, sprinting, long distance & relay.
